description:
Rewrote all instruments based off of isolated tracks, added vocals.
A note on the tuning: I left it as drop D# because it is the closest approximation of the tuning on the actual song. The band played it in drop D and it was sped up after the fact, making the pitch in between D and D#. For ease of playing along with, Songsterr lets you reset the tuning to drop D near the top of the player.
title: Black Hole Sun
